timeline.message: Fix ServiceDeclarationNode in formatting tree modifier
Fix AnnotationAttachPointNode in formatting tree modifier
Remove public keyword form class remote function formatter test
Fix and enable class definition declaration formatter tests
Implent the ResourcePathParameterNode in formatting tree modifier
Skip service related recovery test cases in parser formatting tests

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to check the empty-ness?
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText:
Since a similar behavior is implemented here in FunctionBodyBlockNode, the newline preservation was added here as well.

  
    
      ballerina-lang/misc/formatter/modules/formatter-core/src/main/java/org/ballerinalang/formatter/core/FormattingTreeModifier.java
    
    
         Line 361
      in
      7289b5b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           env.preserveNewlines = true; 
        
    
  


Otherwise, the following parser-tests seems to be failing as well.
https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/declarations/service-decl/service_decl_source_18.bal
https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/compiler/ballerina-parser/src/test/resources/declarations/service-decl/service_decl_source_19.bal
replies.author: sanjana

replies.bodyText:
Preserving the newline is fine. But do we need to check for the empty-ness?
As in, are we not preserving the newlines if the list is not empty?
replies.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: No changes required to the MethodDeclarationNode?
